name: Castle Breakout
description:
“Castle Breakout, with its stunning photo-realistic 3D graphics and engaging set of puzzles, sets the highest new standard for the room-escape genre in 2017.” Some forge steel. Others do battle with swords. Your task, as a security expert, is to make sure the castle is safe. Test the castle's updated security system, find the right clues and solve the challenging puzzles.

Over 1,000 hours of super-computer rendering, and intriguing puzzles, ranging from easy to hard, have made this medieval retro art style puzzle game the must have in your "how to escape" game collection.

__________________

3D RENDERED GRAPHICS IN PHOTO-REALISTIC DETAILS
An experience so natural, you can almost feel the surface of each object.

INTRICATE CLUES AND CHALLENGING PUZZLES
Easy to begin, getting more complicated and hard to put down.

AWARD-WINNING COMPOSER MARCO ANTONINI
The perfect background mood for short or long play!

Appunwrapper.com calls Castle Breakout! HD “ The game that scratches that room-escape itch!”

“The game is excellent! The graphics are amazing! The music is great! I can't find a thing wrong with it other than I want to keep playing it!” Michael Spence, USA
